item.description:
Every January many of the top restaurants in the greater Boston area join together to help end hunger in eastern Massachusetts by offering a delicious brunch to benefit The Greater Boston Food Bank.

We will be going out to Michael's Harborside to support this great event and have a wonderful meal.

ADVANCE ONLINE TICKETS MUST BE PURCHASED FOR THIS EVENT & RESERVATIONS WILL BE MADE FOR OUR GROUP IN ADVANCE.

 

Purchase tickets at the below link as soon as possible.  Once you have purchased your ticket please include that in your rsvp:

http://www.gbfb.org/events/super-hunger-brunch.php

 

The menu is Pre-Fixe for $25.00 you will get the below food and the Greater Boston Food Bank will get the full purchase price towards feeding the hungry:

First Course (Choose One):

Fresh fruit, honey fused mascarpone

Balsmic Greens, grape tomatores, crumbled goat cheese

Clam Chowder, whole baby clams, tender potatoes, salt pork 

Second Course (Choose One):

Crab Cake Benedict - Toasted English muffin, canadian bacon, soft poached eggs, house lump crab cake, lemon tabasco hollandaise sauce.

Seafood Quiche -Shrimp and scallops, grilled zucchini, roasted red peppers, carmalized onions, light anisette herb cream, crispy potato stack

Au Poivre -10oz pepper crusted bistro sirloin, scallion & sourcream smashed potatoes, poached asparagus, brandy mustard cream

Shrimp Saute -crumbled cauliflower, mascarpone cream, extra sharp vermont cheddar cheese, scallions, mushrooms, al dente rigatoni, tender bite sized shrimp

Third Course (Choose One)

Chocolate bourbon bread pudding, vanilla bean ice cream

Key Lime Pie , Raspberry coulis, whipped cream

We hope to see you at this great event

Janet & Donna
item.name: Brunch @ Michaels Harborside to Benefit Greater Boston Food Bank
